Quick Snack Recipes

Masala Maggie

Servings: 2

Ingredients:

  • 1 packet Maggie noodles
  • 1 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, capsicum)
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 1 tomato, chopped
  • 1 tbsp oil
  • 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste
  • 1/2 tsp turmeric powder
  • 1/2 tsp red chili powder
  • Salt to taste
  • 2 cups water

Instructions:

  1. Heat oil in a pan; saut√© onions and ginger-garlic paste.
  2. Add vegetables; cook until soft.
  3. Add tomatoes and spices; cook for 2 minutes.
  4. Add water and Maggie noodles; cook until noodles are done.

Serve: Hot.

Bread Pakoda

Servings: 4

Ingredients:

  • 8 slices of bread
  • 2 cups gram flour (besan)
  • 1 tsp turmeric powder
  • 1 tsp red chili powder
  • Salt to taste
  • Water
  • Oil for frying

Instructions:

  1. Make a thick batter with gram flour, spices, and water.
  2. Dip bread slices in batter; coat evenly.
  3. Deep fry until golden brown.

Serve: Hot with chutney.

Veggie Salad

Servings: 2

Ingredients:

  • 1 cup mixed greens
  • 1 cucumber, chopped
  • 1 tomato, chopped
  • 1 carrot, grated
  • 1/4 cup feta cheese
  • 2 tbsp olive oil
  • 1 tbsp lemon juice
  • Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:

  1. Mix all vegetables in a bowl.
  2. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
  3. Season with salt and pepper.
  4. Top with feta cheese.

Serve: Fresh.

Chilli Cheese Sandwich

Servings: 2

Ingredients:

  • 4 slices of bread
  • 1 cup grated cheese
  • 2 green chilies, finely chopped
  • 1/2 tsp black pepper
  • 1 tbsp butter

Instructions:

  1. Mix cheese, chilies, and pepper in a bowl.
  2. Spread mixture on bread slices; cover with another slice.
  3. Butter the outer sides of the sandwich.
  4. Grill until golden brown.

Serve: Hot.

Masala Corn

Servings: 2

Ingredients:

  • 2 cups boiled corn
  • 1 tbsp butter
  • 1 tsp chaat masala
  • 1/2 tsp red chili powder
  • Salt to taste
  • 1 tbsp lemon juice

Instructions:

  1. Melt butter in a pan; add boiled corn.
  2. Add chaat masala, chili powder, and salt; mix well.
  3. Cook for 2-3 minutes; add lemon juice.

Serve: Hot.

Mango Lassi

Servings: 2

Ingredients:

  • 1 cup mango pulp
  • 1 cup yogurt
  • 1/2 cup milk
  • 2 tbsp sugar
  • 1/4 tsp cardamom powder
  • Ice cubes

Instructions:

  1. Blend mango pulp, yogurt, milk, sugar, and cardamom powder.
  2. Add ice cubes and blend again.

Serve: Chilled.
